contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a polite way of saying "had died." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "After that you may have sexual relations with her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: After that you may lie with her

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "he has sexual relations with her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
This is a polite way of saying "to have sexual relations with someone." Alternate translation: "but when I slept with her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: but when I came near to her

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "having sexual relations with" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "has sexual relations with her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "has sexual relations with her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "has sexual relations with her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])

This is a polite way of saying that he had an emission of semen. Alternate translation: "any man who is unclean because he had an emission of semen while he was asleep" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: any man who is unclean because of what happened to him at night

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a polite way of saying to defecate. Alternate translation: "when you squat down to defecate" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: when you squat down to relieve yourself

contextId.occurrenceNote: Possible meanings are that Moses 1) openly forbids women and men to perform sexual acts as part of temple service or 2) uses a euphemism to forbid women and men to perform sexual acts to receive money. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: cultic prostitute ... among any of the daughters ... among the sons

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "shall have sexual relations with her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
This is a polite way to say "you will die." Alternate translation: "you will die and join your ancestors who have died before you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: you will sleep with your fathers

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a polite way of saying Moses' spirit would join the spirits of his relatives in the world of the dead. Alternate translation: "join your ancestors who died before you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
